adHeader: House Demolition and Debris Removal Service.. 218-0993
adDetails: Silicon Valley Hauling and Demolition Inc. has been serving the greater Bay Area for over 7 years now and is well equipped to handle almost any project, residential, commercial or industrial. From a small detached garage to an entire lot rendered down to clean, graded dirt for redevelopment. We are a one stop shop when it comes to coordinating and complying with the rules and regulations associated with the demolition process. We can handle any and all of the following pre-demolition: Hazardous testing, Hazardous abatement, Drawing and submitting a demolition plan tailored for your specific project, Obtaining a BAAQMD J#, Utility disconnects, Meeting the requirements and writing your Condition/Notification letter for the city and obtaining permits. We include all this in one bid to make your life easier. Please give us a call to schedule a job walk for your next project! -Soft/ Selective Demolition -Deconstruction -Complete take downs -Excavation -Site Preparation -Torch Cutting -Steel Processing -Fire Damage -Recycling standards for LEED -Residential Demolition -Commercial Demolition -Industrial Demolition show contact info http://www.svhauling.com/
